name: CrowdStrike
description:
This plugin fetches hosts and their respective ZTA scores from the CrowdStrike tenant. It also supports the Put RTR Script action on hosts.

 URE score calculation => CrowdStrike host assessment overall score * 10.

configuration.label: Base URL
configuration.description: Base URL of CrowdStrike instance. e.g. https://api.crowdstrike.com

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID generated from the CrowdStrike platform.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret generated from the CrowdStrike platform.

configuration.label: Maximum Score
configuration.description: Only the host(s) with score less than or equal to the Maximum Score will be tracked.
